description:
From their law office in Sycamore, Illinois, the attorneys at Majer, Sheen & Piereth, P.C., provide unmatched legal representation and support to clients throughout DeKalb County and the surrounding areas of Northern Illinois who have legal needs involving any of the following practice areas:

  • Personal injury
  • Criminal defense
  • Family law
  • Divorce, child custody and support, and all related matters

Backed by their more than 60 years of combined legal experience, attorneys Jason Majer, Scott W. Sheen and Kristopher Piereth possess the extensive knowledge and resources necessary to handle your matter efficiently and to increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcome you expect and deserve as cost-effectively as possible. Over the course of their careers, they have successfully tried more than 1,500 civil and criminal cases and have recovered well over $10 million in total compensation for their injury clients.

Honored for their outstanding professionalism and service, they have also earned Top 100 Trial Lawyer designation from both the National Trial Lawyers and America's Top 100 Attorneys as well as Best DWI Attorney rankings. Perhaps more importantly, they have also received "Superb" client ratings on Avvo as well as the 10 Best in Client Satisfaction Award from the American Institute of Criminal Law Attorneys.

This means you can expect to receive the highest level of counsel directly from a local attorney you can trust, and they have an additional law office in Yorkville to provide convenient access to the quality, professional legal support you need. To discuss your issues with no risk, you can contact Majer, Sheen & Piereth, P.C., by calling their office or visiting their website to schedule a free initial consultation.
